section.title: Configuration loading mechanism
section.para: In general, configuration is managed the same as ArjunaCore. Refer to the ArjunaCore Development Guide for more information.

section.title: Configuration options
section.para: The canonical reference for configuration options is the javadoc of the various EnvironmentBean classes. For ArjunaJTA, these classes are the ones provided by ArjunaCore, as well as:
Modules built on ArjunaCore and ArjunaJTA may add additional beans. Please refer to the relevant Development Guides for details of these.
